That's great to hear you're using eco-friendly soap bars and refills! Many online retailers offer discounts, loyalty programs, or rewards for repeat customers to encourage sustainability and loyalty. Here's what I found out about some popular eco-friendly online retailers:

1. **Lush**: Lush has a **Lush Loyalty** program, which rewards customers with points for every purchase. You can redeem points for free products, discounts, or donations to charitable causes. They also offer a **Subscribe & Save** program, which provides 10% off recurring orders.
2. **Thrive Market**: Thrive Market has a **Thrive Gives** program, which donates 1% of every purchase to a non-profit organization. They also offer a **Subscribe & Save** program, which provides 10% off recurring orders, and a **Refer a Friend** program, which gives you $25 credit for each friend you refer.
3. **EarthHero**: EarthHero has a **Rewards Program**, which earns you points for every purchase. You can redeem points for discounts, free products, or donations to environmental organizations. They also offer a **Subscribe & Save** program, which provides 10% off recurring orders.
4. **The Detox Market**: The Detox Market has a **Loyalty Program**, which rewards customers with points for every purchase. You can redeem points for discounts, free products, or gift cards. They also offer a **Subscribe & Save** program, which provides 10% off recurring orders.
5. **Cult Beauty**: Cult Beauty has a **Cult Points** program, which earns you points for every purchase. You can redeem points for discounts, free products, or gift cards. They also offer a **Subscribe & Save** program, which provides 10% off recurring orders.

Before you order, I recommend checking the retailer's website or social media for any promotions, discounts, or limited-time offers. You can also sign up for their newsletters or follow them on social media to stay informed about upcoming deals.

Remember, every little bit counts, and supporting eco-friendly retailers that offer sustainable practices and rewards for loyalty is a great way to make a positive impact on the environment!
